text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Altadena, California | native_name = | other_name = | settlement_type = Census-designated place | image_skyline = Eaton canyon from the air.jpg | image_caption = Aerial view of Altadena and Eaton Canyon | image_flag = File:Flag of Altadena, California.gif | nickname = | motto = | image_map = LA County Incorporated Areas Altadena highlighted.svg | mapsize = 250x200px | map_caption = Location of Altadena in Los Angeles County, California | pushpin_map = USA | pushpin_map_caption = Location in the United States | coordinates = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Los Angeles | established_title = | established_date = | government_type = | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 21.97 | area_total_sq_mi = 8.48 | area_land_km2 = 21.92 | area_land_sq_mi = 8.46 | area_water_km2 = 0.04 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.02 | area_water_percent = 0.19 | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 414 | elevation_ft = 1358 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 42846 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_density_sq_mi = 5061.55 |population_density_km2 = 1954.26 | timezone = Pacific | utc_offset = −8 | timezone_DST = PDT | utc_offset_DST = −7 | postal_code_type = ZIP Codes | postal_code = 91001, 91003 | area_code = 626 | blank_name = FIPS code | blank_info = | blank1_name = GNIS feature IDs | blank1_info = , | website = | footnotes = }} Altadena is an unincorporated census-designated place of Los Angeles County in the state of California, in the United States. 42,846 people were living in Altadena as of 2020. It is about fourteen miles from downtown Los Angeles. It was built as a suburb of Pasadena in 1887. However, although it was meant to be a suburb of Pasadena, it has so far refused to become part of Pasadena. == References == == Other websites == * * Altadena Town Council * Altadena Chamber of Commerce Category:Unincorporated communities in California Category:Census-designated places in California Category:Settlements in Los Angeles County, California Category:1887 establishments in California
title: Altadena, California
